name: Night vision
description: Allows your Primary Drone to see in total darkness up to Close and low-light up to Very Far.
blurb: Low-light electro-optics package that grants a drone calibrated image-intensification and thermal overlay. Enables target identification and navigation in ≤0.1 lux conditions; susceptible to dazzling and IR countermeasures.

name: Lock kit
description: Give your Primary Drone the ability to make a Finesse check using your character's Finesse ability when attempting to open a physical or electronic lock.
blurb: Mechanical and electronic manipulator set for bypassing simple physical locks and actuating deadbolts. Includes micro-pick tools, torque sensors, and a low-power lock-sniffer; ineffective against hardened smartlocks without credential compromise.

name: Electronic surveillance kit
description: Give your Primary Drone the ability to eavesdrop on electric signals within Very Far.  If those signals are encrypted, you must make a Knowledge check against the Environment Difficulty to decrypt.
blurb: Modular sensor array for passive RF interception, short-range IMSI/SSID scanning, and analog audio pickup. Provides packet capture, signal fingerprinting, and buffered evidence storage; legal and ethical constraints apply.

name: Extra weapon
description: Your Primary Drone gains an extra attack, d6+2
blurb: Auxiliary hardpoint for mounting compact kinetic or directed-energy arms (pistol-class). Integrated recoil dampening and fire-control link; increases lethality at cost of power draw and signature.

name: Grenade
description: Place a token on this card and remove 1 grenade from your inventory.  Your Primary Drone now has the ability to launch that grenade as an attack action .
blurb: Single-use payload dispenser compatible with fragmentation, flashbang, or EMP cartridges. Designed for one-shot delivery with programmable fuse timing; blast radius and collateral effects vary by munition type.  A new token can only be applied as a action or during a rest.

name: Rocket launcher
description: Place 1 token on this card and remove 1 rocket from your inventory (must be acquired or built during a long rest).  Your Primary Drone now has the ability to launch that rocket as an attack action.
blurb: Tube-mounted single-shot launcher for small rockets or breaching charges. High structural and recoil load; intended for anti-vehicle or fortification breaching tasks and requires operator authorization.

name: Extra armor
description: +1 Armor, +2 / +2 to Major and Severe damage thresholds, -1 Evasion
blurb: Composite plating upgrade that increases drone ballistic and fragmentation resistance.

name: Submersible
description: Your Primary Drone gains a watertight hull and sealed propulsion package enabling limited underwater operation. Supports shallow submersion, periscope comms, and buoyancy control; not rated for deep-sea pressures.

name: Signal jammer
description: Your Primary Drone gains a signal jammer such that all comms (ally and adversary) within Close are effectively jammed.  All other drones within Very Close can no longer receive signal or commands.
blurb: Active RF emitter that disrupts selected frequency bands within a defined radius. Effective against unsecured comms and simple remote control links; high power use and easily traced.

name: Signal booster
description: Your Primary Drone can now operate anywhere within the Scene and is invulnerable to signal jamming if within Close of you.
blurb: High-gain relay and phased antenna array that extends line-of-sight comms and uplink resilience. Improves datarate and range for swarm coordination; increases RF detectability.

name: Melee weapon
description: Your drone gains an extra Melee range attack, damage: d8+3
blurb: Compact melee attachment modeled on Southeast Asian blades (keris/kris-style dagger). Designed for close-quarters utility and nonlethal deterrence when fitted with blunt or taser-tip variants; carries cultural resonance in certain districts.

name: Grappling device
description: Your Primary Drone has an embedded grappling hook and 10m of cable.
blurb: Winch and tether system with motorized spool for anchoring or lifting small loads. Provides up to X kg dynamic pull (specify model), includes load sensors and auto-retract safety cutout.

name: Storage locker
description: Your Primary Drone  gains an internal modular cargo bay with secure locking and temperature stabilization. Supports mission-specific payloads, evidence retention, and concealment; access controlled via cryptographic key.
blurb: Internal modular cargo bay with secure locking and temperature stabilization. Supports mission-specific payloads, evidence retention, and concealment; access controlled via cryptographic key.

name: Digger
description: Your Primary Drone gaines the ability to burrow through soil at a rate of 3m / minute.
blurb: Compact excavation kit with rotary auger and soil displacement sensors for shallow burrowing or substrate sampling. Suited for covert emplacement or forensic retrieval; limited by ground composition and energy budget.

name: Chemical analysis tool
description: Your Primary Drone gains the ability to constantly monitor environment within Close for any chemical hazards and can detect explosives as well.
blurb: Onboard spectrometer suite (FTIR/GC-MS microvariant) for rapid field profiling of liquids, vapors, and residues. Returns compound matches and confidence scores; requires consumables and calibration for high-accuracy results.

name: Stealth shield
description: Your Primary Drone gains the ability to trigger the Hidden condition as an action.  That condition persists until it takes any other action.
blurb: Adaptive material overlay and EM-absorbent coating that reduces radar, LiDAR, and thermal signatures. Lowers detection probability at cost of increased power draw and reduced heat dissipation.

name: Portable barrier
description: Your Primary Drone gains the ability to deploy a linear barrier.  Any creature can gain the Hidden condition by crouching down behind the barrier, but the drone may now gain the Hidden condition from its own portable barrier.
blurb: Deployable modular barrier (inflatable or rigid-panel) for instant cover and crowd control. Provides temporary line-of-sight obstruction and blast attenuation; assembly time and emplacement footprint vary by model.

name: Telescope
description: Your Primary Drone gains the ability to see with a 20x optical zoom, plus an additional 10x digital zoom allowing it to see and capture high quality images and video within 400m
blurb: High-resolution optical zoom assembly with motorized stabilization and focus. Extends visual range for long-distance reconnaissance
